name: Ali Karizi
story: Jajil Yousuf was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the Iranian military as soon as he was able, and quickly rose through the ranks due to his impressive leadership skills and dedication to his duties. Eventually, he caught the attention of the OPFOR, who offered him a position within their organization. Jajil accepted and is now one of the most respected and experienced members of the OPFOR's Middle Eastern division.
